dialogue.utterance: Have you seen the latest exhibit on digital installations? The interactivity is revolutionary in engaging the audience.

dialogue.utterance: I get that, but isn’t it also somewhat distracting? Sometimes too much interactivity can overshadow the art itself.
dialogue.annotation: I get that, but isn’t <aspect_02> interactivity </aspect_02> <opinion_02> somewhat distracting </opinion_02>? <rationale_02> Sometimes too much interactivity can overshadow the art itself </rationale_02>.

dialogue.utterance: That’s an interesting point. Still, the way it allows personalized experiences is thrilling. It lets us connect to the art uniquely.
dialogue.annotation: That’s an interesting point. Still, <aspect_03> personalized experiences </aspect_03> are <opinion_03> thrilling </opinion_03>, <rationale_03> as it lets us connect to the art uniquely </rationale_03>.

modality.caption: An interactive digital installation with viewers engaged uniquely.

dialogue.utterance: I love how digital art can evolve over time, adapting and transforming with viewer engagement. That dynamism is captivating!
dialogue.annotation: I love how <aspect_04> digital art </aspect_04> can <opinion_04> dynamically evolve </opinion_04> <rationale_04> with viewer engagement, adapting and transforming </rationale_04>.

dialogue.utterance: It sure is, but I worry that this fast pace might lead to a lack of depth in the viewer’s experience over time.
dialogue.annotation: It sure is, but I worry that <aspect_05> fast pace </aspect_05> might lead to a <opinion_05> lack of depth </opinion_05> <rationale_05> in the viewer’s experience over time </rationale_05>.

dialogue.utterance: In my experience, once you really focus on a digital piece, its depth emerges profoundly, but it does take an effort to engage fully.
dialogue.annotation: In my experience, once you really focus on a <target_01> digital piece </target_01>, its <aspect_06> depth </aspect_06> <opinion_06> emerges profoundly </opinion_06>, <rationale_06> but it does take an effort to engage fully </rationale_06>.

dialogue.utterance: Exactly! I used to think that merely being interactive was enough, but after some of my own experiences, I see the value of depth a lot more.
dialogue.annotation: Exactly! I used to think that being <aspect_07> interactive </aspect_07> was <opinion_07> enough </opinion_07>, but <rationale_07> after some of my own experiences, I see the value of depth a lot more </rationale_07>.
